name: shoal-shell
short_effect: No effect. Gen III: Trade four and four Shoal Salts for a Shell Bell.

flavor_text.black_white: A pretty seashell that can be found deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A pretty seashell that can be found deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
